00209 {
00210    static unsigned char channel = 0;
00211    static unsigned long value;
00212    static unsigned char cnt = 0;
00213    unsigned char i;
00214    float t;
00215 
00216    if (cnt == 0) {
00217       /* switch to new channel */
00218       channel = (channel + 1) % N_CHANNEL;
00219       AMX0SL = channel & 0x0F;
00220       ADC0CF = 0xE0 | (GAIN & 0x07);    // 16 system clocks and gain
00221 
00222       value = 0;
00223    }
00224 
00225    /* integrate 16 times */
00226    for (i = 0; i < 16; i++) {
00227       DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00228 
00229       ADCINT = 0;
00230       ADBUSY = 1;
00231       while (!ADCINT);          // wait until conversion ready, does NOT work with ADBUSY!
00232 
00233       ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00234 
00235       value += (ADC0L | (ADC0H << 8));
00236       yield();
00237    }
00238 
00239    cnt++;
00240 
00241    if (cnt == 0) {              /* average 16*256 = 4096 times */
00242       value /= 256;
00243 
00244       /* convert to volts, op-amp gain of 10 */
00245       t = value / 65536.0 * 2.5 / 10;
00246 
00247       /* convert to Ohms (1mA excitation) */
00248       t = t / 0.001;
00249 
00250       /* convert to Kelvin, coefficients obtained from table fit (www.lakeshore.com) */
00251       t = 5.232935E-7 * t * t * t + 0.0009 * t * t + 2.357 * t + 28.288;
00252 
00253       /* convert to Celsius */
00254       t -= 273.15;
00255 
00256       /* correct offset */
00257       t += user_data.ofs[channel] / 100.0;
00258 
00259       DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00260       user_data.temp[channel] = t;
00261       ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00262    }
00263 }

void set_power ( void   ) 

Definition at line 270 of file scs_700.c.

References ca, cycle, i, last_time, N_CHANNEL, P1, time, and user_data.

00271 {
00272    static unsigned long on_time, last_time;
00273 
00274    unsigned char i;
00275    float frac;
00276    unsigned long expired;
00277 
00278    /* only process each 10ms */
00279    if (time() == last_time)
00280       return;
00281 
00282    last_time = time();
00283 
00284    /* turn output off after on-time expired */
00285    for (i = 0; i < N_CHANNEL; i++)
00286       if (user_data.power[i] < 100) {
00287          expired = time() - on_time;
00288          if (expired >= (unsigned long) (user_data.power[i])) {
00289             frac = user_data.power[i] - (unsigned long) (user_data.power[i]);
00290 
00291             if (frac == 0 || expired >= (unsigned long) (user_data.power[i]) + 1) {
00292                P1 &= ~(1 << i);
00293             } else if (cycle > 0) {
00294                if ((float) ca[i] / cycle > frac) {
00295                   P1 &= ~(1 << i);
00296                } else {
00297                   ca[i]++;
00298                }
00299             } else {
00300                ca[i]++;
00301             }
00302          }
00303       }
00304 
00305    /* turn all outputs on every second */
00306    if (time() - on_time >= 100) {
00307       last_time = on_time = time();
00308       for (i = 0; i < N_CHANNEL; i++)
00309          if (user_data.power[i] > 0)
00310             P1 |= (1 << i);
00311 
00312       cycle = (cycle + 1) % 10;
00313 
00314       if (cycle == 0)
00315          for (i = 0; i < N_CHANNEL; i++)
00316             ca[i] = 0;
00317    }
00318 }
